2084.subject: SBS
2084.descrlong: Presents a comparative survey of ancient civilizations in sub-Saharan Africa and Egypt.  Emphasizes the archaeology and history of the civilizations of sub-Saharan Africa and Eurasia, and the cultural impact of sub-Saharan Africa on the cultures and peoples of the Middle East, Asia, Europe, and the Americas.  Egypt, Axum, Meroe, Zimbabwe, Benin, Kush, Zulu, and the East and West African kingdoms serve as case studies. Materials include internet sites, CD-ROMs, readings, videos, museum tours, lectures, and problem-oriented discussions.
